Package prj02

Class HuffmanCoding

java.lang.Object
prj02.HuffmanCoding
public class HuffmanCoding
extends java.lang.Object
The Huffman Encoding Algorithm This is a data compression algorithm designed by David A. Huffman and published in 1952 What it does is it takes a string and by constructing a special binary tree with the frequencies of each character. This tree generates special prefix codes that make the size of each string encoded a lot smaller, thus saving space.
Since:
10/16/2021
Version:
2.0
Author:
Fernando J. Bermudez Medina (Template), A. ElSaid (Review), Sebastian J. Caballero Diaz 802-19-2461 (Implementation)

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • load_data

      public static java.lang.String load_data​(java.lang.String inputFile)
      Receives a file named in parameter inputFile (including its path), and returns a single string with the contents.
      Parameters:
      inputFile - name of the file to be processed in the path inputData/
      Returns:
      String with the information to be processed

    • compute_fd

      public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> compute_fd​(java.lang.String inputString)
      This method takes an input string and makes a map for the frequency distribution, It loops through the input string's characters so that if it's a new character (not in map yet), it adds it to the map and puts this "count" to 1. Otherwise, of the character is already on the map, it puts in the map but instead summing 1 to the count.
      Parameters:
      inputString - string that contains the message's characters/symbols
      Returns:
      Map with the symbol's frquency distribution

    • huffman_tree

      public static Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> huffman_tree​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> fD)
      This method starts constructing the huffman tree after receiving the map with the frequency distribution. It loops through this map's keys in order to add them to the tree with their values. Then, the next for loop starts the process to construct the huffman tree.
      Parameters:
      fD - Map with the character's frequency distribution
      Returns:
      Root node of the huffman tree

    • huffman_code

      public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> huffman_code​(Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> huffmanRoot)
      Receives the rootNode of the huffman tree and maps each symbol to their Huffman code with a helper method huffman_code_helper. This helper method recursively puts in the frequency distribution map all the designated keys and values.
      Parameters:
      huffmanRoot - The root returned in the huffman_tree method
      Returns:
      A recursive call to huffman_code_helper returning the symbol map with their huffman codes.

    • encode

      public static java.lang.String encode​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> encodingMap, java.lang.String inputString)
      This method is responsible for encoding the message. Takes the map with the symbols and their huffman codes and the inputString, which contains the message to encode. Creates and encoded String by adding the symbols of the encodingMap to the own string in a for loop.
      Parameters:
      encodingMap - The huffman codes map
      inputString - contains the message to be encoded
      Returns:
      The encoded string

    • process_results

      public static void process_results​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> fD, HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> encodedHuffman, java.lang.String inputData, java.lang.String output)
      Receives the frequency distribution map, the Huffman Prefix Code HashTable, the input string, and the output string, and prints the results to the screen (per specifications). Output Includes: symbol, frequency and code. Also includes how many bits has the original and encoded string, plus how much space was saved using this encoding algorithm
      Parameters:
      fD - Frequency Distribution of all the characters in input string
      encodedHuffman - Prefix Code Map
      inputData - text string from the input file
      output - processed encoded string

    • huffman_code_helper

      public static HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> huffman_code_helper​(HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> symbolHCodeMap, Tree.BTNode<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> hRoot, java.lang.String digit)
      Helper method for huffman_code. Does recursive calls to find the mapping for the symbol's codes (keeps assigning 0 if its a left child, 1 if its a right child) until the base case is reached (no more childs from left or right side. Returns the map with the character and its digit that will be used for encoding.
      Parameters:
      symbolHCodeMap - Map with the symbols and their corresponding huffman codes
      hRoot - root node of the huffman tree
      digit - that will be used for encoding
      Returns:
      The map with the symbols and their huffman code values.

    • decodeHuff

      public static java.lang.String decodeHuff​(java.lang.String output, HashTable.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> lookupTable)
      Auxiliary Method that decodes the generated string by the Huffman Coding Algorithm Used for output Purposes
      Parameters:
      output - - Encoded String
      lookupTable -
      Returns:
      The decoded String, this should be the original input string parsed from the input file
